text: The National (Metsovian) Technical University of Athens (NTUA; , National Metsovian Polytechnic), sometimes known as Athens Polytechnic, is among the oldest higher education institutions of Greece. It is also one of the best engineering schools in the country and the world. It was founded in 1837. ==References== Category:Establishments in Greece Category:1837 establishments in Europe Category:Technical colleges and universities in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Athens
title: National Technical University of Athens
